List of Useful Resources

This page lists useful online tools and resources for pentesting

Resource Description
Segfault Disposable Root Servers. Segfault offers free unlimited Root Servers. A new server is created for every SSH connection.
WADComs WADComs is an interactive cheat sheet with a curated list of offensive security tools and commands for Windows/AD environments.
GTFOBins GTFOBins is a curated list of Unix binaries that can be used to bypass local security restrictions in misconfigured systems.
LOLBAS Living Off The Land Binaries, Scripts and Libraries. The goal of the LOLBAS project is to document every binary, script, and library that can be used for Living Off The Land techniques.
LOLDrivers Living Off The Land Drivers is a community-driven project that provides a curated list of all Windows drivers that have been found abused by adversaries to bypass security controls and execute malicious code.
HackTricks A comprehensive pentesting resource.
HackTricks Cloud A comprehensive pentesting resource with detailed guides on Clouds.
PayloadsAllTheThings A list of useful payloads and bypasses for Web Application Security.
The Book of Secret Knowledge A collection of inspiring lists, manuals, cheatsheets, blogs, hacks, one-liners, cli/web tools, and more.
IT Tools Handy tools for developers. Like OTP/QR Generator, Converters, Encryption/Decryption and many more.
CyberChef A simple, intuitive web app for analysing and decoding data without having to deal with complex tools or programming languages.
ADSecurity Focused on Active Directory security, offering tools and insights for pentesting LDAP and AD.
